serv_2.title: Portugal
serv_2.description: A republican country in southwestern Europe. The east is in the Iberian Peninsula of Spain, the western and southern parts of Portugal is the Atlantic coast, the terrain north high south low, mostly mountain and hills. Portugal is rich in mineral resources and has a long history.
